notes.text:
This update for protobuf-c fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-48468: Fixed an unsigned integer overflow. (bsc#1210323)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: protobuf-c before 1.4.1 has an unsigned integer overflow in parse_required_member.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
